revised_title: Fossil Remains of Two Species of Megalanian Genus (Meiolania) from Lord Howe's Island
tldr: The author describes the fossil remains of two species of the Megalanian genus (Meiolania) found on Lord Howe's Island. These fossils represent smaller species with distinct characteristics compared to Megalania Ow. The author provides detailed descriptions of the skull, jawbone, vertebras, scapula, and pelvic arches of these species, as well as their habitat and geological context.
